resources.string:
“Common Man ” a collective noun that is often used for in fact a huge group of people , who are diversified very much in many ways . Each one thinks different , acts different and each one has a unique passion . Grouping all of them under one word is so unfair . Isn’t it? 


 So we decided we bring to you at least some of the people into focus through this blog . We live in a society that is so much partitioned that we do not know or care to know about each other’s world . It’s often surprising that the faces we see every day have so much to tell us about ,their struggles, happiness and stories of triumph , all that could be an inspiration to some of us . And we have so much to offer each other.Let’s take a sneak peek into our neighbor’s world.
